price: 37. Détiendraient-ils les trésors de ton Seigneur ? Seraient-ils, eux, les maîtres dominateurs ?
arabic: أَمۡ عِندَهُمۡ خَزَآئِنُ رَبِّكَ أَمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡمُصَۜيۡطِرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: am ʿindahum khazāinu rabbika am humu al-muṣayṭirūna
